评论详情: OVERALL The bag was MUCH SMALLER than advertised as well as being flimsy, having poor stitching, and the cup holders being so small they are rendered useless. STRAPS The straps hold the bag oddly and tilts the bag forward in addition to folding it in half, and yes it does that even when packed full (I was filling it with my stuff and I picked it up and well… STRUCTURAL INTEGRITY In the product images the bag appeared sturdy and capable of holding heavier objects however when I put less than 2lbs (4.4kgs) I heard a seem pop. Which is strange for “double stitched” I checked it was not there was one layer of stitch made of thin thread.
She loves her bag as it allows more versatility.

In less than a month the left outside pocket is tearing off. When I first received it; it felt flimsy and poorly constructed and knew it wouldn’t last. It comes with a label indicating a 6 month warranty which I saved, but it is still under Amazon’s return policy so I am returning it to them.  It is true to size but not to scale as shown in the product photos of the people in the library and on the street. It is much smaller. You can’t even fit a small water bottle or umbrella in the outside pockets as shown.
Got this bag for my 17 yo daughter. She absolutely loves it holds all her school stuff and so far has held up very well

评论概述: Nice bag, but water bottle pocket too small.
评论详情: Really like the style of the bag and all the pockets but the water bottle pocket is tiny and is kind of useless.

I had gotten this bag at the beginning of the year, and had already noticed signs of loose stitching on the straps and some of the insides as well, but for the first two months it held up together pretty good! The bag itself is exactly as described, I was able to fit my computer, folder and notebooks in there quite well. Throughout the later months though, it actually broke on me and I had to stitch it up myself and not only that, there’s beginning to be stitching coming undone from the inside as well. For a bag that isn’t even a year old, I would hope that it would’ve lasted longer than the almost 8 months I’ve had it. I used the bag primarily for school, so if you’re not planning on carrying a lot of things in this bag, then maybe it’s a good choice for you, but as a school bag it doesn’t exactly meet my standards.
I purchased a month before school.  My daughter used for two days and it already ripped. Not able to return as we are outside the return window

My daughter was looking for a messenger type bag to use at high school instead of using a backpack. This holds her notebooks, folders, and Chromebook. She added cute pins to the outside flap to decorate it and says it is comfortable to use.

The bag itself is not horrible, looks just like picture. Material is a little thin. The biggest complaint is the strap. It is a shorter strap even when let out all the way. Probably more appropriate for middle schooler, not high school or higher.

I laughed out loud when I opened this. It's tiny! Not even close to 15.6 inches! This bag measures 10x13x3.5. The strap is thin and too short for most adults. The drink pockets on the side are too small to hold even a standard water bottle! It's child size.

评论概述: Great bag for school and work needs.
评论详情: I've had the bag for about a month and it's actually really great! I use this bag for school and work and it can fit so much inside of it.  In the main pocket I am able to fit a chromebook, three subject notebook, a sketchbook, four class folders, a pencil case, novel, and calculator.  It's a bit hard to fit my water bottle in the side pocket, but it does fit.  The front right pocket fits my wallet and my work name tag, and the front left is able to fit snacks I carry with me. I also use the top flap to fit more snacks in.  I have noticed no tears or anything, its just gotten a bit dirty. The strap is a little uncomfortable, since its just a single strap that has no padding or anything, but its okay. Very great bag for the amount of money I paid!
i use if for school every single day and it stores a lot and is super durable. only con is if ut gets too heave the strap hurts a little
